attributes.action: Ban Cafe's and Restaurants from serving tea made in cups and not teapots!
attributes.additional_details:
Stop cafe's and restaurants from serving disgusting emulsion like tea made in the cup and not brewed properly in pots. Every cafe or restaurant and other food outlets should be banned from this practice that is increasingly creeping in throughout the UK. We want properly brewed tea in proper pots (not leaky stainless steel ones) and real service as we pay enough for it.

All Cafes should provide a basic level of service for serving tea beverages that employ the use of a teapot!
